title: 96/657/EC: Commission Decision of 12 November 1996 authorizing Italy to continue trials on a new oenological practice (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 12 November 1996 authorizing Italy to continue trials on a new oenological practice (Only the Italian text is authentic) (96/657/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Italy is hereby authorized to continue trials relating to the use of lysozyme in wine-making until 31 August 1999 and involving a maximum of 50 000 hectolitres during each of the 1996/97, 1997/98 and 1998/99 wine years under the conditions laid down in Article 26 of Regulation (EEC) No 822/87.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 November 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
